aboutText: Hey, good to see you here. So, you already know that I am a brazilian multidisciplinary designer and web developer, right? Well, let me tell you a little more. I like the intersection between art and technology, so I discovered myself as a front-end developer, although I like to participate in all stages of project development, feeling comfortable both in UI/UX when in programming. I am currently working as a freelancer and willing to work with cool projects anywhere in the world. Anyway, nice to meet you. ✌️
